\subsection*{Problem 2a}

\begin{par}
$$ C = [ B, AB]$
\end{par} \vspace{1em}
\begin{verbatim}
A = [ 0 1;0 0];
B = [0;1];

C = [ B,A*B ]

if det(C) ~= 0
    disp('reachable')
end
\end{verbatim}

        \color{lightgray} \begin{verbatim}
C =

     0     1
     1     0

reachable
\end{verbatim} \color{black}
    

\subsection*{Problem 2b}

\begin{verbatim}
syms k1 k2 s

A_hat = A - B*[k1 k2]

controller = det( s*eye(2) - A_hat)
\end{verbatim}

        \color{lightgray} \begin{verbatim} 
A_hat =
 
[   0,   1]
[ -k1, -k2]
 
 
controller =
 
s^2 + k2*s + k1
 
\end{verbatim} \color{black}
    \begin{par}
comparing equations we have
\end{par} \vspace{1em}
\begin{par}
$k1 = 1$
\end{par} \vspace{1em}
\begin{par}
$k2 = 0.14$
\end{par} \vspace{1em}


\subsection*{Problem 2c}

\begin{verbatim}
t = 2;

time = [ 1 0 0 0;....
         0 1 0 0;...
         1 t t^2 t^3;...
         0 1 2*t 3*t^2];
vec = [-5;0;1;1];

a = time\vec
\end{verbatim}

        \color{lightgray} \begin{verbatim}
a =

   -5.0000
         0
    4.0000
   -1.2500

\end{verbatim} \color{black}
